item.title: Project 1: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: Introduction The two datasets that I have chosen to use for my analysis are Temp_increase_1850_2018_and co2_concentration_1850_2018_. These two datasets contain information on global temperature increase and global Co2 emissions. The first dataset looks into global temperature increase from 1850-2017. The second dataset looks into global Co2 emissions as well as emissions from some of the worldâ€™s largest producers, the US and China from the years 1850-2017. I chose these datasets because I was interested in seeing the relationship between carbon emissions both globally and from the biggest producers and the way it correlates with global temperature increase.
